attributes.name: rawAuthProperties

methods.description: Retrieves an authentication property by specified index.

methods.description: (Static) get Basic Auth Header Value

attributes.name: rawAuthProperties
attributes.description: The authentication properties returned as array

methods.name: getRawAuthProperty
methods.description: Retrieves an authentication property by specified index.

classes.name: RESTAuthenticationManager
classes.description: Provides authentication types listing and creation.

methods.name: getRESTAuthentications
methods.description: Returns all available authentication types.

methods.name: getSessionModes
methods.description: Returns the supported session modes.

methods.name: createAuthentication
methods.description: Creates an authentication instance.

classes.name: RESTCookie
classes.description: Wrapper around http cookie. RESTCookie objects are read-only.

attributes.name: privateKeyId
attributes.description: The Id of the PrivateKeyEntry to use for client cerificate authentication.

methods.name: getCookies
methods.description: Retrieves cookies associated with this RESTHost.

methods.name: clearCookies
methods.description: Clears the cookies associated with this RESTHost.

methods.name: clearExpired
methods.description: Clears cookies associated with this RESTHost expired by the given date.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the REST host.

methods.name: newHostFromThis
methods.description: Creates a new host from this REST host.

methods.name: addOperation
methods.description: Adds a new operation to the host.

methods.name: updateOperation
methods.description: Updates a REST operation.

methods.name: getOperation
methods.description: Retrieves an operation by id.

methods.name: removeOperation
methods.description: Removes a REST operation from this host.

methods.name: getOperations
methods.description: Retrieves all operation names.

methods.name: addSchemaFromUrl
methods.description: Adds an XSD schema from a given URL.

methods.name: addSchemaFromXmlString
methods.description: Adds an XSD schema provided as a string.

methods.name: removeAllSchemas
methods.description: Removes all associated XSD schemas from this host.

methods.name: getSchemaElements
methods.description: Retrieves all XML elements for a given namespace, from XSD files for this host.

methods.name: getSchemaNamespaces
methods.description: Retrieves all namespaces from XSD files for this host.

methods.name: supportParallelRequests
methods.description: Check if the current REST host instance supports parallel request executions

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a RESTRequest using the host data.
methods.parameters: method: String, url: String, content: Any

methods.name: createRequestWithOptions
methods.description: Creates a RESTRequest using the host data.
methods.parameters: method: String, url: String, content: Any, options: RESTRequestOptions

methods.name: setAutoUrlRedirect
methods.description: (DEPRECATED) Set automatic URL redirection. If set to true, the generated HTTP request will automatically follow the URL redirects (upon HTTP response status 301, 302 and 307). Return true if the value is propagated. setRedirectStrategy method is to be used.

methods.name: getAutoUrlRedirectEnabled
methods.description: (DEPRECATED) Check if the automatically redirection is enabled. getRedirectStrategy method is to be used.

methods.name: setRedirectStrategy
methods.description: The chosen redirect strategy. Possible values are defaultRedirect, neverRedirect, alwaysRedirect.

methods.name: getRedirectStrategy
methods.description: Returns which redirect strategy is used

methods.name: executeRequestWithCredentials
methods.description: Executes a request with provided credentials. Supported only for hosts created with RESTHostManager.createTransientHostFrom() with HTTP Basic Authentication.
methods.parameters: method: String, url: String, content: Any, user: String, pass: String

classes.name: RESTHostManager
classes.description: Provides CRUD operations for RootElement objects.

methods.name: createHost
methods.description: Creates a RESTHost object.

methods.name: createHostSupportingParallelRequests
methods.description: Creates a RESTHost object with option to use new Http Context per request. With that setup the Rest Host supports parallel requests.

methods.name: addHost
methods.description: Adds a RESTHost object to the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: updateHost
methods.description: Updates the specified RESTHost in the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: removeHost
methods.description: Removes a RESTHost object from the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: getHost
methods.description: Retrieves a RESTHost object by name.

methods.name: getHosts
methods.description: Retrieves an array of available host names.

methods.name: reloadConfiguration
methods.description: Reloads the plug-in configuration.

methods.name: createWorkflow
methods.description: Generates a workflow from a REST operation.
methods.parameters: operation: RESTOperation, workflowName: String, category: WorkflowCategory, defaultContentType: String

methods.name: createWorkflowWithXsdInput
methods.description: Generates a workflow from a REST operation.
methods.parameters: operation: RESTOperation, workflowName: String, category: WorkflowCategory, namespace: String, elementName: String, defaultContentType: String

methods.name: createTransientHostFrom
methods.description: Creates a new transient (not persisted) host.

methods.name: createTransientOperationFrom
methods.description: Creates a new transient RESTOperation. If Tthe base URL of operation's host is changed, all subsequent requests to the operation will be executed against the new base URL (new host).

methods.name: getOpenApiServiceUrl
methods.description: Get the OpenAPI service URL from OpenAPI spec and the preferred protocol

methods.name: createRESTHostFromOpenApiSpecString
methods.description: Creates rest host from OpenAPI spec provided as string
methods.parameters: hostName: String, openApiSpec: String, preferredUrl: String, params: java.util.Map

methods.name: createRESTHostFromOpenApiUrl
methods.description: Creates rest host from OpenAPI url provided as string
methods.parameters: hostName: String, url: String, auths: AuthorizationValue[], preferredUrl: String, params: java.util.Map

methods.name: getSwaggerServiceUrl
methods.description: Get the Swagger service URL from Swagger spec and the preferred protocol
methods.parameters: swaggerSpec: String, host: String, basePath: String, preferredCommunicationProtocol: String

methods.name: createRESTHostFromSwaggerSpecUrl
methods.description: Adds a new operation from a URL.
methods.parameters: hostName: String, swaggerSpecUrl: String, auths: AuthorizationValue[], preferredCommunicationProtocol: String, params: java.util.Map

methods.name: createRESTHostFromSwaggerSpecString
methods.description: Adds a new operation from string definition
methods.parameters: hostName: String, swaggerSpec: String, host: String, basePath: String, preferredCommunicationProtocol: String, params: java.util.Map

attributes.name: inParametersCount
attributes.description: The count of the input parameters (all parameters defined in the URL template) for this operation

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: HTTP method of this operation (GET, HEAD, PATCH, POST, PUT, OPTIONS, TRACE or DELETE)

attributes.name: urlTemplate
attributes.description: The URL template for this operation (ex. /operation/{param1}?param2={param2})

attributes.name: defaultContentType
attributes.description: The default content type of the content input for this operation (meaningful for operations with method PUT or POST)

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the REST operation.

methods.name: newOperationFromThis
methods.description: Creates a new operation from this REST operation.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a RESTRequest by using the information contained in this operation and its parent host.

methods.name: createRequestWithOptions
methods.description: Creates a RESTRequest by using the information contained in this operation and its parent host.
methods.parameters: params: String[], content: Any, options: RESTRequestOptions

methods.name: getInParameters
methods.description: Retrieves the names of URL template input parameters.

methods.name: getHeaderParameters
methods.description: Retrieves the names of HTTP request headers.

methods.name: getPathParamsCount
methods.description: The path parameters count.

methods.name: getDefaultContentType
methods.description: Get the default content type

methods.name: getSupportedContentTypes
methods.description: Get the supported request body content type

methods.name: addSupportedContentType
methods.description: Add a supported content type

methods.name: getSupportedAcceptHeaderMediaTypes
methods.description: Get supportet Accept header media types

methods.name: addPreferredAcceptHeaderMediaType
methods.description: Add preferred media type for the Accept header

methods.name: addSupportedAcceptHeaderMediaType
methods.description: Add supported media type for the Accept header]

methods.name: isPathParamMandatory
methods.description: Is a mandatory path parameter.

methods.name: addMandatoryPathParameter
methods.description: Marks an existing path parameter as mandatory.

methods.name: isQueryParamMandatory
methods.description: Check if query param is mandatory]

methods.name: addMandatoryQueryParameter
methods.description: Marks an existing query parameter as mandatory.

methods.name: isHeaderParamMandatory
methods.description: Is a mandatory header parameter.

methods.name: addMandatoryHeaderParameter
methods.description: Marks an existing header parameter as mandatory.

classes.name: RESTRequest
classes.description: Utility class created from REST operation (or host), used to make the actual HTTP request.

attributes.name: fullUrl
attributes.description: Retrieves the full request URL - the one combining the host base URL and operation URL template with filled in input parameters

attributes.name: contentType
attributes.description: The content type of the request

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Runs the HTTP request.

methods.name: executeWithCredentials
methods.description: Runs the HTTP request with provided Basic HTTP Authentication credentials. This operation is supported only for requests executed against RESTHost that supports Basic HTTP Authentication.

methods.name: setHeader
methods.description: Sets an additional HTTP header to this request.

methods.name: getMethod
methods.description: Get HTTP method of the request.

classes.name: RESTResponse
classes.description: Utility class used for HTTP server response.

attributes.name: contentAsString
attributes.description: The server's response content as a string

methods.name: getHeaderValues
methods.description: Retrieves the server's response header values per header with specified name

methods.name: getAllHeaders
methods.description: Retrieves the server's response headers as a Properties object.
